section.p:
This template provides a mechanism for grouping result observations. It contains information applicable to all of the contained result observations. The Result Organizer code categorizes the contained results into one of several commonly accepted values (e.g., "Hematology", "Chemistry", "Nuclear Medicine").
If any Result Observation within the organizer has a statusCode of "active", the Result Organizer must also have a statusCode of "active".

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-7126, CONF:1198-9134, CONF:1198-32588 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-31865)
Note: The effectiveTime is an interval that spans the effectiveTimes of the contained result observations. Because all contained result observations have a required time stamp, it is not required that this effectiveTime be populated.

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:1198-7124, CONF:1198-14850)
Conforms to Result Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2:2015-08-01)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-31149)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

The value for 'code' in a result organizer SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) OR SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12). Laboratory results SHOULD be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or other constrained terminology named by the US Department of Health and Human Services Office of National Coordinator or other federal agency (CONF:1198-19218, CONF:1198-19219)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHALL conform to Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (CONF:7121, R2.1=CONF:1198-7121)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7122, R2.1=CONF:1198-7122)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7127, R2.1=CONF:1198-7127)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:7128, R2.1=CONF:1198-7128)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:7123, R2.1=CONF:1198-7123), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Result Status 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.39 STATIC 2013-08-09 (CONF:14848, R2.1=CONF:1198-14848)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-31865)
Note: The effectiveTime is an interval that spans the effectiveTimes of the contained result observations. Because all contained result observations have a required time stamp, it is not required that this effectiveTime be populated.

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:1198-7124, CONF:1198-14850)
Conforms to Result Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2:2015-08-01)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-31149)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

The value for 'code' in a result organizer SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12). Laboratory results SHOULD be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or other constrained terminology named by the US Department of Health and Human Services Office of National Coordinator or other federal agency. Local and/or regional codes for laboratory results SHOULD also be allowed. (CONF:7164)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" Cluster (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) OR SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="BATTERY" Battery (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7165)

The value for 'code' in a result organizer SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) OR SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12). Laboratory results SHOULD be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or other constrained terminology named by the US Department of Health and Human Services Office of National Coordinator or other federal agency (CONF:1198-19218, CONF:1198-19219)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

body.codeblock: <organizer xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1060822780"/> <code code="1220291084"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id root="MDHT" extension="2085521236"/> <code code="420462734"/> <assignedPerson/> <representedOrganization/> </assignedAuthor> </author> <component> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1955223538"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <interpretationCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.83" codeSystemName="ObservationInterpretation"/> <interpretationCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.83" codeSystemName="ObservationInterpretation"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor/> </author> <referenceRange> <observationRange/> </referenceRange> </observation> </component> </organizer>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7126, CONF:9134 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1"

Consol Result Organizer The value for 'code' in a result organizer SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12). Laboratory results SHOULD be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or other constrained terminology named by the US Department of Health and Human Services Office of National Coordinator or other federal agency. Local and/or regional codes for laboratory results SHOULD also be allowed. (CONF:7164)

Consol Result Organizer SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" Cluster (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) OR SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="BATTERY" Battery (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7165)
SHALL conform to CDA Organizer
Consol Result Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (CONF:7121, R2.1=CONF:1198-7121)
Consol Result Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7122, R2.1=CONF:1198-7122)
Consol Result Organizer SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7127, R2.1=CONF:1198-7127)

Consol Result Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:7123, R2.1=CONF:1198-7123), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Result Status 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.39 STATIC 2013-08-09 (CONF:14848, R2.1=CONF:1198-14848)
Consol Result Organizer SHALL contain [1..*] component (result) such that it (CONF:7124, CONF:14850) Conforms to Result Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2)
Consol Result Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:7128, R2.1=CONF:1198-7128)
